byline.contributor: Karam Shoumali contributed reporting from Gaziantep, Turkey; Hwaida Saad from Beirut, and Maher Samaan from Paris.

abstract: Rebel fighters in Syria express frustration with Turkey's involvement, saying incursion is also effort by Turkey to attack Kurdish militia, which Syrian opposition sees as ally in fight against both Islamic State and government of Pres Bashar al-Assad.
lead_paragraph: The Turkish incursion into Syria has buoyed the groups under the banner of the Free Syrian Army, but those fighters are under no illusions that their new allies support their revolution.
snippet: The Turkish incursion into Syria has buoyed the groups under the banner of the Free Syrian Army, but those fighters are under no illusions that their new allies support their revolution....

headline.main: Knowing the Risks, Some Syrian Rebels Seek a Lift From Turks’ Incursion
headline.print_headline: Knowing the Risks, Some Syrian Rebels Seek a Lift From Turks’ Incursion
